resources.string: The %1$s in %2$s is cheap! We should buy it!
Press on the %1$s button to buy.
The %1$s\'s price in %2$s is high. Lets sail to there!
We reached %1$s! Lets sell our %2$s is high price!
We reached %1$s with most of our %2$s. Lets sell it high price!
Lets sell our %1$s is high price!
Press on the %1$s button to sell it.
We should deposit our cash in the bank before go to sleep.
Press on the bank button to deposit the money.
It is a good time to go to sleep.
Press on the sleep button to rest until tomorrow.
We should draw the money from the bank to continue trading.
Press on the bank button to draw the money.
Our ship is damaged. We should fix it!
Press on the fix button to do it.
